action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of Nebraska (for himself and Ms. Sewell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the 96-hour physician certification requirement for inpatient critical access hospital services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Critical Access Hospital Relief Act of 2022.

section.header: Removing Medicare 96-hour physician certification requirement for inpatient critical access hospital services
